channel.title: CEH on Note about technology
channel.description: Recent content in CEH on Note about technology

item.title: Rootkits: The Hidden Threat
item.description:
Rootkits: The Hidden Threat

Rootkits are a set of tools and software used to maintain hidden access to a computer system after it has been compromised. They are designed to be stealthy and difficult to detect, making them a significant security threat.

item.title: What is a Rubber Hose Attack?
item.description: A Rubber Hose Attack refers to a technique in cryptography and cybersecurity where physical or psychological coercion is used to extract information. This term is often used metaphorically to contrast with theoretical or technical methods of breaking encryption.
